_xResult.title: What Everyone Wants Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made shift dress with button embellishments
_xResult.longdesc:
This custom made white dress defines elegance with its simplicity and extra fine fabric. The cut, with the slit, sleeve length and button embellishments are all very mod—we just can't get enough! You'll be it IT-girl in this viscose-crepe blend. As always, this bespoke dress comes with several customization options:

 

Necklines: u-neck, v-neck, jewel 

 

Dress Length: above knees, knee length, below knees and maxi

 

Sleeves: short-sleeves, 3/4-sleeves, full-sleeves

 

If you've never experienced having a dress made custom to your measurements, you'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
